articles.title: Stock market today: Asian markets are steady in holiday-thinned trade - The Associated Press
articles.description: Asian shares have advanced, with most world markets closed for the Christmas holiday. On Friday, Wall Street closed its eighth straight winning week with a quiet finish. The S&P 500 rose 0.2% to sit less than 1% below its record. The Dow slipped less than 0.1…
articles.content: BANGKOK (AP) Asian shares were mostly higher on Monday after Wall Street capped its eighth straight winning week with a quiet finish following reports showing inflation on the way down and the econom… [+2875 chars]

articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for December 26 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Stocks in Asia were mixed while currencies in the region ticked higher amid cautious trading and thin liquidity with some markets closed for holidays.
